meanings.definition: Emitting light as a result of a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent1: The chemiluminescent stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The glow stick was chemiluminescent, providing light without electricity.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies had a chemiluminescent party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The chemiluminescent paint on the walls made the room feel magical.
meanings.sent5: The chemiluminescent jellyfish illuminated the dark ocean waters.

meanings.definition: A substance that emits light as a result of a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the chemiluminescent in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The glow stick liquid is a chemiluminescent used for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies were the chemiluminescent stars of the night.
meanings.sent4: The chemiluminescent of the ocean at night is mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The chemiluminescent of the potion glowed in the dark room.
